Entries.default: The vithrack floats before you, her mandibles shivering slightly as she examines you with unmoving eyes like gems set into her head.
"Show me what you have for sale."
<ispeech>Indeed. Hatched in darkness. This one served the contract, as the colony has for generations.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Come turn eyes upon it. This one crafted much of it myself.</ispeech>

<ispeech>Sissak tells this one that you have freed the colony from its bondage. This one is grateful, and offers sincerest apologies for any - prior misunderstandings.</ispeech> 

Her mouthparts click quietly together.
With a sweeping gesture of her spindly fingers, she indicates the objects stacked near her.
"Well, I did my fair share of violence, so water under the spider bridge?"
"Sorry is right. How do you intend to make it up to me?"
<ispeech>The colony's provisions from the surface are limited, but this one has collected and created goods within the facility.</ispeech>
<ispeech>Happily does this one make them available to kithling ally, in exchange for supplies or coin. </ispeech>

<ispeech>Which is not to say this one has never left. Sometimes work must be done upon the surface.</ispeech>

She shrugs, a motion in which she involves the entire length of her arms.
<ispeech>But kithling has freed us of that yoke. This one thanks you still.</ispeech>
"What use are coins to you down here?"
<ispeech>That is this one's quiet-time secret, not for the knowing of kithling.</ispeech>
